input.sentences: it was in a big city .
i could see surfers in the distance .
the kangaroo enclosure was my favorite .
there were some big crocodiles too .
output.sentences: This city's zoo has such a vast and interesting array of animals, from the small and unique to the more known and larger.
There's beautiful vistas and if animals are not your thing there's beaches to lay on and waves to surf, as one can see from a distance.
The pier is a favorite spot for many, to watch the waves, or take a walk.
For those that do like animals the kangaroos are fun to watch.
The crocodiles are scarey, but also mesmerizing to see as well.
